properties.description: Please input a folder path as the parameter for this pipeline, and the pipeline will delete files which were last modified more than 30 days ago under the particular folder path.

activities.name: DeleteFiles
activities.description: Connect to your storage account to save the log file.

properties.description: Connect to your source store to delete files.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empId as short,
		empName as string,
		empGender as string,
		deptId as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employee
Employee aggregate(groupBy(deptId),
	TotalEmployees = count(empId)) ~> AggregateOnDept
AggregateOnDept sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TotalEMployeesByDepartment'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		{Dept Id} = deptId,
		{Total Employees} = TotalEmployees
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		empId as short,
		empName as string,
		empGender as string,
		deptId as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employee
source(output(
		deptId as short,
		deptName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> department
Employee aggregate(groupBy(deptId),
	TotalEmployees = count(empId)) ~> AggregateOnDept
AggregateOnDept, department join(AggregateOnDept@deptId == department@deptId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Joins
Joins sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DepartmentNamebyEmployeeCount'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		{Department Name} = deptName,
		{Total Employees} = TotalEmployees
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OutputDatabyDepartmentName

source(output(
		empId as short,
		empName as string,
		empGender as string,
		deptId as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employee
Employee split(equals(deptId, 1),
	equals(deptId, 2),
	equals(deptId, 3),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSpilDeptId@(HR, Accounts, IT, PAYROLL)
ConditionalSpilDeptId@HR sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['HREmployees'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> HREmployees
ConditionalSpilDeptId@Accounts sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['AccountsEmployees'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AccountsEmployees
ConditionalSpilDeptId@IT sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ITEmployees'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ITEmployees
ConditionalSpilDeptId@PAYROLL sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['OtherEmployees'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OtherEmployees

source(output(
		id as short,
		name as string,
		dob as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> tempTable
tempTable split(isNull(toDate(dob, 'yyyy-mm-dd')),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ErrorOutput, RestOfTheRows)
ConditionalSplit1@RestOfTheRows derive(dob = toDate(dob, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) ~> DerivedColumn2
ConditionalSplit1@ErrorOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		DOB as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> BadData
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		DOB as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		DOB = dob
	)) ~> CorrectRows

source(output(
		empId as short,
		empName as string,
		empGender as string,
		deptId as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employee
employee filter(equals(deptId,3)) ~> filterPayroll
filterPayroll sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> outputPayroll

source(output(
		empId as short,
		empName as string,
		empGender as string,
		deptId as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employee
source(output(
		deptId as short,
		deptName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> department
empGenderModification, department join(employee@deptId == department@deptId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Joins
department derive(deptName = upper(deptName)) ~> deptModification
empNameModification derive(empGender = upper(empGender)) ~> empGenderModification
employee derive(empName = upper(empName)) ~> empNameModification
Joins sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EmpDeptMerger'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		empId,
		empName,
		empGender,
		deptName
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MergeBothEmpDept
